alert.note: Alert for Houston; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Wilkinson, Twiggs and northeastern Houston Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nicklesville to Cary to near Bonaire to near Houston Lake, and moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jeffersonville, Warner Robins, Centerville, Danville, Allentown, Robins Air Force Base, Marion, Tarversville, Sand Bed, Bullard, Houston Lake, Fitzpatrick, Ripley, Huber, District Path, Myricks Mill, Elberta, Bonaire, Kathleen and Clinchfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
